content.text: Uquine was a planet in the Colonies region of the galaxy. The agricultural scientist Tepha Leonis gave birth to her second child, Zare Leonis on the planet, although the Leonis family left the world, living in a number of locations including the space station Hosk Station and the planet Lothal.

Uquine was first created for the Essential Atlas, a Star Wars Legends reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace in 2009. In 2015, Fry introduced the planet into canon, when he mentioned it in the novel Servants of the Empire: Rebel in the Ranks.

elements.text: Servants of the Empire: Rebel in the Ranks
